technologies.name: Java
technologies.description: Extensive expertise in developing robust and scalable enterprise-level applications using Java. Proficient in utilizing frameworks like Spring and Hibernate to create high-performance backend services, as well as in building microservices and RESTful APIs.

technologies.name: Laravel
technologies.description: Proficient in building full-featured web applications with Laravel, leveraging its elegant syntax and powerful tools to develop secure and maintainable codebases. Experienced in implementing MVC architecture, RESTful routing, and integrating third-party services.

technologies.name: SQL
technologies.description: Skilled in designing, optimizing, and managing relational databases using SQL. Capable of writing complex queries, stored procedures, and triggers to ensure data integrity and performance. Experienced in working with various SQL databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, and SQL Server.

technologies.name: ETL
technologies.description: Expertise in designing and implementing ETL processes to extract data from various sources, transform it according to business requirements, and load it into target systems. Proficient in using ETL tools such as Talend, Apache NiFi, or custom scripts to ensure efficient data flow and accuracy.

projects.title: Software de Gesti贸n de Inventarios
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive inventory management system to streamline the tracking, ordering, and stocking of products. The system includes features for real-time inventory updates, automated reorder alerts, and detailed reporting. Technologies used: Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, and Angular.

projects.description: Created an administrative management system for schools that handles student enrollments, course scheduling, and staff management. The platform supports multiple user roles with varying levels of access and integrates with third-party services for enhanced functionality. Technologies used: Laravel, MySQL, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.

projects.title: Sistema de Facturaci贸n Electr贸nica SIAT
projects.description: Implemented an electronic invoicing system compliant with local tax regulations, enabling businesses to generate and submit invoices digitally.
